summary: In this context, Buta-1,3-diene and Butadiene are mentioned as part of a list of carcinogenic substances evaluated by the International Agency for Research on Cancer (IARC). However, the terms are used interchangeably, as Buta-1,3-diene is a common name for Butadiene. The context does not provide any additional information on their specific relationship or distinct characteristics beyond their classification as carcinogens.
